blogPost.excerpt: Think you've got a great taste in music? Are you down with the latest trends? Consider yourself a bit of music connoisseur, ey!?..Well, let's see what this AI thinks about that! 🤖
blogPost.body: Think you've got a great taste in music? Are you down with the latest trends? Consider yourself a bit of music connoisseur, ey!?..Well, let's see what this AI thinks about that! 🤖
blogPost.title: How Bad Is Your Spotify? - A sophistacted A.I. judges your awful taste in music.
blogPost.author: Nathan Svirsky

localize.description: 你觉得你对音乐很有品味吗？你了解最新的流行趋势吗？认为自己是一个音乐鉴赏家，嗯！？..那么，让我们看看这个AI对此有什么想法！🤖
localize.tagline: 一个装腔作势的人工智能会评判你糟糕的音乐品味。

localize.description: 你覺得你對音樂很有品味嗎？你瞭解最新的流行趨勢嗎？認爲自己是一個音樂鑑賞家，嗯！？..那麼，讓我們看看這個AI對此有什麼想法！🤖
localize.tagline: 一個裝腔作勢的人工智能會評判你糟糕的音樂品味。

previous.excerpt: Contterio is a service where you can create unique cool designs for your content with the help of smart algorithms. And you can get all this in less than a couple of seconds. The number of templates for your content is unlimited because it is created instantly.
previous.title: Contterio - How to quickly and easily create any content.

localize.description: Contterio是一项服务，在该服务中，您可以在智能算法的帮助下为您的内容创建独特的酷炫设计。你可以在不到几秒的时间内完成所有这些。您的内容的模板数量是无限制的，因为它是即时创建的。
localize.tagline: 如何快速、轻松地创建任何内容。

localize.description: Contterio是一項服務，在該服務中，您可以在智能算法的幫助下爲您的內容創建獨特的酷炫設計。你可以在不到幾秒的時間內完成所有這些。您的內容的模板數量是無限制的，因爲它是即時創建的。
localize.tagline: 如何快速、輕鬆地創建任何內容。

next.excerpt: Pizazz helps you engage viewers and capture attention during video meetings in three simple steps - select a background, upload your slides and voila! Pizazz is FREE for the launch!
next.title: Pizazz - Virtual presentations for Zoom

localize.description: Pizazz通过三个简单的步骤帮助您在视频会议期间吸引观众并吸引注意力-选择背景、上传幻灯片和瞧！PIZAZS的发布是免费的！
localize.tagline: 用于缩放的虚拟演示文稿

localize.description: Pizazz通過三個簡單的步驟幫助您在視頻會議期間吸引觀衆並吸引注意力-選擇背景、上傳幻燈片和瞧！PIZAZS的發佈是免費的！
localize.tagline: 用於縮放的虛擬演示文稿
